Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Before I greet you, I should thank you!
So...sarqso!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>This is the central hub of the search for
<clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff>, and no place for the likes
of you.
Leave before I put a hole in that mask
of yours!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What a view... And it would be greedy to
keep it all to myself! Some powerful deity
might try and smite me for not sharing...
Well, once we've rescued <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0>
I'll have to go convince my friends in town
to travel and experience this!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So you'd better hurry up, find the
princess, and bring her back here.
We'll keep this place safe until you do.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Keep Princess Zelda—and this scenery—
safe from that <clr:0000>Demon King<clr:ffff>!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're here to see <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>, right?<sp:5:1:0> She's at
the <clr:0000>telescope<clr:ffff>. Hurry and speak with her.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I can't really imagine <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> being in a place
as dangerous as Hyrule Castle...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
BlackZelda_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>Well...<sp:5:0:0>you're probably more interested
in hearing about <clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff> than my
words of gratitude...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You're here to see <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>, right? She's at
the <clr:0000>telescope<clr:ffff>. Hurry and speak with her.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Most of us Gerudo soldiers haven't
traveled out of the Gerudo region before.

And now that I've seen this view
in person...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Well, once we've rescued <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0>
I'll have to go convince my friends in town
to travel and experience this!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Most of us Gerudo soldiers haven't
traveled out of the Gerudo region before.

And now that I've seen this scenic rainfall
in person...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Well, once we've rescued <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0>
I'll have to go convince my friends in town
to travel and experience this!
